metadata.title: CVE-2019-13313 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
libosinfo 1.5.0 allows local users to discover credentials by listing a process, because credentials are passed to osinfo-install-script via the command line.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-13313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-libosinfo-1.0 - 1.6.0-1
libosinfo-1.0-0 - 1.6.0-1
libosinfo-bin - 1.6.0-1
libosinfo-l10n - 1.6.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libosinfo package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.0-1').
